text: im just curious where this is at in the system, i dont think ive seen this. Is this a 3rd party app that integrates?

Hello HubSpotters, I am looking for a way to setup a workflow based on the customer sending an email to one of our internal email addresses. If this is possible. I only see these below in the activity.

<@U504BHZ6K> according to me there is no 'listener' in HubSpot, however you can use zapier and the HubSpot integration to achieve this, in zapier  you can set up a virtual mailbox that gets monitored, the next step in zapier is to trigger either a form or a contact value, depending on needs, or even manually enroll in the WF directly.

Question - I’m noticing when in previews for pages or in debug mode, the styles and js for modules are being injected into the actual page instead of linked files. Previously that wasn’t the case, is there a reason for that?

Hey there.
Since a few days i have a very annoying bug on the UI. Modals (Form/worfklow name when cloned, Slide In Media Library) started to close themself after 1-2 sec after they open. Anyone has the same behavior? It seems to be as soon as i clicke inside a `text input` or click anywhere
possible temporary workaround till they fix it, try tabbing into the fields instead
that's always been the case
for the v2 modules at least
That worked with TAB + Enter key
But mouse click trigger the close :neutral_face:
minifying and uploading the files takes time, so inlining them ensures you see your changes immediately

hmm, not sure that it’s always been the case because I recall seeing the css and js files linked and inspecting those files to debug things as recently as last week. The only thing that changed when you used debug was that the files were no longer combined, they were separated css and js files.

The reasoning makes sense though for changing it.

Hey guys… I’m in need of some DEV :muscle: .  Anyone here interested in a quick HS side project/cash??  In a nutshell, I’m trying to improve my Google speed rating by implementing a lazy image loader, JS consolidation, and a handful of other items that may be of high-impact.

Shoot me a DM  if you’re interested or know of someone who is. I’m not looking for a deal. I’ll pay handsomely. :moneybag:
What is your specific issue? If it is wide spread, we may need to fix that for all HS hosted pages.
Is there a way to know why combining isn't happening for a specific site/portal?
CSS combining? I can take a look?
yes, for the CSS. I will DM you the url. Thanks!

bug found: Rich text editor’s spacing options don’t work anymore for embeds because the HubL code that is now used doesn’t accomodate for that

 <@U6W3H6YN8>  tagging because I think you touched the HubL Video tag at one point
Will is OOO, but I'll take a look <@U7SL518D6>
Hi <@U6TBZ66FN> - No, I don’t believe it’s wide spread at all. I’m largely just seeking help to further optimize my site/product for speed. It’s got an “Average” rating on the Google Page Speed test.
<@U7SL518D6> What are you referring to? The margin and padding options?
OK
<#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> may be a good place to cross-post this :slightly_smiling_face:
Thanks for helping <@U6TBZ66FN>!!
the rich text field when you add an embed you can specify margin  settings on it when clicking the embed. Those don’t actually do anything anymore
<@U22PKFRU5> thanks dude! I didn’t know a channel like that was available. Just added it. :slightly_smiling_face:
there are a ton of new channels hiding in there - browse them :slightly_smiling_face: Some good ones
Cheers!
